response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and varies greatly depending on its intended use. With that in mind, I am extending a special offer to you. If you are interested in exploring the possibilities of this product for your needs or desires, I am willing to consider a negotiation. However, to start our discussion, my initial offer for the product is $750,000. Please let me know if this is within your consideration range, and we can proceed from there. I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 750000}
